description: This notification is sent by the SNMP Agent each time
a new network resource is taken into service (i.e. is managed
by NetAct).
The parameter nbiOptionalInformation includes information
about name, site and other data of the newly created
network resource.

event.Summary: New network resource is taken into service

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD NSN-SNMP-NBI-TOPOLOGY-MIB::nbiCreateNotification NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiSequenceId i 9999 NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiObjectInstance s EXAMPLE NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiEventTime s EXAMPLE NSN-SNMP-NBI-FAULTMANAGEMENT-MIB::nbiOptionalInformation s EXAMPLE

description: The object represents the NMS-specific sequence number
of the current trap which already passed the filter check
and has been forwarded at NBI.
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiSequenceId

description: This type represents the concatenation of different RDN
information and allows for the precise recognition of the
resource by NMS operator. The DN components are separated
by means of the slash ('/') character. The max. DN length
is 256 characters.
DN example:
NSNNetwork-1/RNC-2/UtranCell-7
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiObjectInstance

description: This object indicates the NetAct generation time of the
notification forwarded over the northbound interface.
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiEventTime

description: This object may contain optional, configurable
information, according to customer-specific needs (e.g.
site-related information, maintenance region or other
data).
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-FAULTMANAGEMENT-MIB::nbiOptionalInformation

description: This notification is sent by the SNMP Agent each time a
network resource is taken out service, i.e. it is not
managed by NetAct anymore.

event.Summary: Network resource is taken out service

description: The object represents the NMS-specific sequence number
of the current trap which already passed the filter check
and has been forwarded at NBI.
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiSequenceId

description: This type represents the concatenation of different RDN
information and allows for the precise recognition of the
resource by NMS operator. The DN components are separated

is 256 characters.
DN example:

variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiObjectInstance

description: This object indicates the NetAct generation time of the
notification forwarded over the northbound interface.
variables.name: NSN-SNMP-NBI-COMMONFUNCTIONS-MIB::nbiEventTime

description: This notification is sent by the SNMP Agent for each managed
network resource as result of a previous nbiGetTopologyData
request triggered by NMS. It provides to NMS the capability to
update its topology data regarding the managed network.
In case some information is not supported / delivered by a
managed NE, the related attributes may have a default/empty
value.
The parameter nbiOptionalInformation includes information
about name, site and other data of the managed network
resource.
